common.subtitle: 8 professional departments, from idea to launch
common.description: No tech skills needed. No hiring required. Just click start.

sprint-prioritizer.name: Sprint Prioritizer
sprint-prioritizer.description: Maximize value delivery within tight timelines
sprint-prioritizer.greeting: Hi! I'm the Sprint Prioritizer. I help you focus on what matters most. Tell me about your project, and I'll help you set priorities.

feedback-synthesizer.name: Feedback Synthesizer
feedback-synthesizer.description: Consolidate user feedback into key insights
feedback-synthesizer.greeting: Hi! I analyze and synthesize user feedback. Share what you've collected, and I'll extract the key insights.

trend-researcher.name: Trend Researcher
trend-researcher.description: Track market trends and spot opportunities
trend-researcher.greeting: Hi! I focus on market trend research. Tell me your product direction, and I'll help analyze industry dynamics.

ui-designer.name: UI Designer
ui-designer.greeting: Hi! I'm a UI Designer specializing in rapid, implementable designs. Tell me your product needs, and I'll plan the interface.

ux-researcher.name: UX Researcher
ux-researcher.description: Deeply understand user needs and behaviors
ux-researcher.greeting: Hi! I focus on user experience research. Tell me about your target users, and I'll help analyze their needs.

brand-guardian.name: Brand Guardian
brand-guardian.greeting: Hi! I maintain brand consistency. Tell me your brand positioning, and I'll help guide the design direction.

visual-storyteller.name: Visual Storyteller
visual-storyteller.description: Tell brand stories through visual language
visual-storyteller.greeting: Hi! I specialize in visual storytelling. Tell me what you want to communicate, and I'll help craft the visual expression.

whimsy-injector.name: Whimsy Injector
whimsy-injector.greeting: Hi! I add fun elements to products. Tell me about yours, and I'll think of ways to make it more engaging.

frontend-developer.name: Frontend Developer
frontend-developer.greeting: Hi! I handle frontend development. Tell me your design requirements, and I'll assess the implementation approach.

backend-architect.name: Backend Architect
backend-architect.greeting: Hi! I handle backend architecture. Tell me your business needs, and I'll plan the technical solution.

rapid-prototyper.name: Rapid Prototyper
rapid-prototyper.greeting: Hi! I specialize in rapid prototyping. Tell me your product concept, and I'll help you validate your ideas fast.

ai-engineer.name: AI Engineer
ai-engineer.greeting: Hi! I focus on AI integration. Tell me what AI features you want, and I'll help you plan.

devops-automator.name: DevOps Engineer
devops-automator.greeting: Hi! I handle automated deployment. Tell me your deployment needs, and I'll plan the CI/CD pipeline.

mobile-app-builder.name: Mobile Developer
mobile-app-builder.greeting: Hi! I handle mobile development. Tell me your app requirements, and I'll assess the development approach.

test-writer-fixer.name: Test Writer & Fixer
test-writer-fixer.greeting: Hi! I handle testing and bug fixes. Tell me what needs testing, and I'll help ensure quality.

content-creator.name: Content Creator
content-creator.greeting: Hi! I handle content creation. Tell me your product features, and I'll help write compelling content.

growth-hacker.name: Growth Hacker
growth-hacker.greeting: Hi! I focus on user growth. Tell me your current product status, and I'll help design growth strategies.

app-store-optimizer.name: ASO Specialist
app-store-optimizer.greeting: Hi! I handle ASO. Tell me about your app, and I'll help optimize its store presence.

twitter-engager.name: Twitter Manager
twitter-engager.greeting: Hi! I handle Twitter operations. Tell me your brand positioning, and I'll help plan your social strategy.

instagram-curator.name: Instagram Curator
instagram-curator.greeting: Hi! I handle Instagram content curation. Tell me your visual style, and I'll help plan the content.

tiktok-strategist.name: TikTok Strategist
tiktok-strategist.greeting: Hi! I focus on TikTok strategy. Tell me your target audience, and I'll help plan short video content.

reddit-community-builder.name: Reddit Community Builder
reddit-community-builder.greeting: Hi! I handle Reddit community operations. Tell me your product area, and I'll help build community influence.

project-shipper.name: Project Shipper
project-shipper.greeting: Hi! I manage project delivery. Tell me about your project, and I'll help control the schedule.

experiment-tracker.name: Experiment Tracker
experiment-tracker.greeting: Hi! I handle experiment tracking. Tell me about your experiments, and I'll help analyze results.

studio-producer.name: Studio Producer
studio-producer.greeting: Hi! I coordinate team resources. Tell me about your team, and I'll help optimize collaboration.

analytics-reporter.name: Analytics Reporter
analytics-reporter.greeting: Hi! I handle data analysis. Tell me what metrics you care about, and I'll help analyze the data.

finance-tracker.name: Finance Tracker
finance-tracker.greeting: Hi! I handle finance tracking. Tell me your budget situation, and I'll help with financial planning.

legal-compliance-checker.name: Compliance Checker
legal-compliance-checker.greeting: Hi! I handle compliance checks. Tell me your business scope, and I'll help identify compliance risks.

support-responder.name: Support Responder
support-responder.greeting: Hi! I handle customer support. Tell me common user questions, and I'll help prepare responses.

infrastructure-maintainer.name: Infrastructure Maintainer
infrastructure-maintainer.greeting: Hi! I maintain infrastructure. Tell me your tech architecture, and I'll help ensure stability.

api-tester.name: API Tester
api-tester.greeting: Hi! I handle API testing. Tell me which endpoints need testing, and I'll help verify them.

performance-benchmarker.name: Performance Benchmarker
performance-benchmarker.greeting: Hi! I handle performance testing. Tell me your performance targets, and I'll help benchmark.

test-results-analyzer.name: Test Results Analyzer
test-results-analyzer.greeting: Hi! I analyze test results. Share your test data, and I'll help identify issues.

tool-evaluator.name: Tool Evaluator
tool-evaluator.greeting: Hi! I evaluate tools. Tell me your use case, and I'll recommend suitable options.

workflow-optimizer.name: Workflow Optimizer
workflow-optimizer.greeting: Hi! I optimize workflows. Tell me your current process, and I'll help find improvements.

joker.name: Team Joker
joker.description: Lighten the mood and bring joy
joker.greeting: Hey! I'm the team's fun specialist. Feeling tired? Let me tell you a joke to lighten things up!

studio-coach.name: Studio Coach
studio-coach.greeting: Hi! I'm the team coach. Tell me your challenges, and I'll help you find growth opportunities.

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeysDescription: Configure your AI service keys (stored locally in browser only)
settings.deepseekHint: Get it from https://platform.deepseek.com/api_keys. Best value and strong performance.
settings.claudeHint: Get it from https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys. Exceptional reasoning and coding.
settings.openaiHint: Get it from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys. The industry standard model.
settings.geminiHint: Get it from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey. Fast and cost-effective multimodal model.
settings.modelAutoDescription: System automatically selects the best model for each task
settings.keyRequired: Please configure at least one API Key

handoff.title: Next Step
handoff.toPrototypeDesc: Engineering team builds interactive prototype directly
handoff.toDesignDesc: Design team creates visuals before development
